name: Steven Dow
content: Steven Dow I am a Professor in the Department Cognitive Science and in the Design Lab at UC San Diego. My research group explores how we might design socio-technical systems that support collective problem solving within communities. I teach courses on interaction design, social computing, and mobile service innovation. Learn more about me and our research program, and see our latest work below. News By spdow September 5, 2025 Prof. Dow will appear on a panel for “Storytelling in the Era of AI” hosted by Pactto.com (Oct 8 in Vista, CA) By spdow August 12, 2025 Thanks to the Organizing Committee for making CI’25 a conference to remember! By spdow August 8, 2025 Three cheers for Jeongeon Park, Jude Rayan, and Nancy Quo for giving excellent talks on their research papers at ACM CI’25 By spdow August 6, 2025 Prof. Dow was honored to host ACM CI’25 Aug 4-6 in LA Jolla CA By spdow April 28, 2025 My incoming PhD student Sirui Tao presented his CHI 2025 paper on “Dimensional Scaffolding for Text-to-Image Product Design” By spdow April 28, 2025 Congrats to Tone Xu for her paper at CHI 2025 exploring different ways of integrating AI into design workflows By spdow April 22, 2025 Prof. Dow spoke on “Cultivating Ecosystems of Intelligence” for MIT’s Center for Collective Intelligence and Northeastern’s BostonCHI By spdow March 24, 2025 Congrats to former PhD student Srishti Palani for her ACM CHIIR 2025 paper on “Contextualizing the Role of Web Search In Creative Workflows” By spdow November 4, 2024 Steven Dow to lead D4SD workshop at the World Design Policy Conference on Nov 12 By pendari1090 June 24, 2024 Tone’s C&C 2024 paper on “Idea-Centric Search” illustrate four patterns of information seeking during creative ideation More Home About Research Teaching
